data_descriptor.name: duration
data_descriptor.description: Approximate Sleep duration in number of hours

data_descriptor.name: verdict
data_descriptor.description: Analysis of the sleep_duration which is one of the three verdict: 1. less_than_usual 2. more_than_usual 3. usual_sleep_duration. Usual time is a range from (mean - standard_deviation) to (mean + standard_deviation).The sleep_duration which are less than usual time are labeled less_than_usual and the sleep_duration which are more than usual time are labeled as more_than_usual, rest are usual_sleep_duration.

data_descriptor.name: deviation
data_descriptor.description: How much deviated from the usual time (in minutes).

data_descriptor.name: verdict_int
data_descriptor.description: 0 - less than usual, 1 - usual or more than usual

algorithm.description: The sample is a list which conatais sleep duration, verdict of usual, more than usual or less than usual sleep duration and deviation of sleep duration from usual. More precisely, data sample is a list with three elements as follows: 0 - Sleep duration in hours, 1 - verdict (more_than_usual, less_than_usual, usual_sleep_duration), 2 - deviation from the usual sleep duration in hours. All sleep durations and deviations are floating point number and the unit is hour
